name: Google Play Similar Apps Intelligence
title: Google Play Similar Apps Intelligence
description: The most comprehensive API for Similar Apps data. Access Similar Apps data for all Google Play apps & games in 93 countries. Useful for data-driven App Store Optimization, competitor tracking and market research / analysis.

endpoints.name: Referring Apps
endpoints.description: Retrieve the apps that refer to any app / game in the Similar App Cards on the Google Play Store for a given day / period + country. Cost is 3 credits per 100 referring apps (or any fraction of it). You can use the parameter limit to avoid unexpected charges.

endpoints.name: Similar Apps
endpoints.description: Retrieve the apps / games that appear in the Similar App Cards of any app for a given day and country. Cost is 1 credit per 5 similar apps (or any fraction of it). You can use the parameter limit to avoid unexpected charges.

endpoints.name: Top SVRank
endpoints.description: Retrieve the TOP SVRank apps for a given day and country. Cost is 3 credits per 100 results (or any fraction of it). You can use the parameter limit to avoid unexpected charges.
